_sText:
Found a map called "cs_mansion_v2" and saw that it had no hostages like the original cs_mansion map,
and decided to add the hostages. I don't know the exact locations of the hostages, but I do know what rooms they are in. I assume the creator is this person: https://gamebanana.com/members/209447

 Here is the original mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/100122

Not really sure how copyright works in general, but id like to emphasize that I did not create this mod, and are just adding the missing hostages. I have sent an email to the original creator asking for permission.
